title: [Melgorehn's Valley, Grasslands]
description: You are nearly at the opposite end of the grasslands from the bridge.  Far to the south, you can see the edge of a forest, over rough terrain.  Getting there from here would be difficult in the meager light and with so many treacherous burrows about, and you decide it's simply not worth the walk.
